mods.abstract: Two color window card (red on orange) announcing the Adairville Strawberry Festival featuring a car and tractor show in Adairville, Kentucky on May 9. Poster features a woodcut of a circus scene.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
